Title: Authorizes the Monroe county jail to be used for the detention of persons under arrest for arraignment in any court in the county of Monroe
Summary: Authorizes the Monroe county jail to be used for the detention of persons under arrest for arraignment in any court in the county of Monroe.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to authorizing the Monroe county jail to be used for the detention of persons under arrest for arraignment in any court in the county of Monroe
